titles.title: A bill to express the sense of Congress on interoperability with Taiwan.
A bill to express the sense of Congress on interoperability with Taiwan.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This bill states that the United States should seek to support (1) improving Taiwan's asymmetric defense capabilities; (2) bolstering deterrence to preserve peace, security, and stability across the Taiwan Strait; (3) and deepening defense capability interoperability with Taiwan.
